content: the double_crochet-treble_crochet-double_crochet single_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet double_crochet skip 1 st behind the double_crochet- treble_crochet-double_crochet single_crochet x 8 slip_stitch in the bl of the 1st single_crochet and pull through a 4 single_crochet 4 double_crochet 2 treble_crochet © big splash by yvonne van zijl @bokkyshome 2023 11 round 12 a in the photo i used c later i realized that a might look better chain 1 double_crochet in the single_crochet that is to the left of the fpedc2tog of round 10 indicated in the 1st photo below it is located behind the double_crochet of round 11 3 single_crochet fptr around fpedc3tog of round 9 3 single_crochet double_crochet in the single_crochet that is to the right of the fpedc2tog of round 10 indicated in the 2nd photo below single_crochet x 8 slip_stitch in the bl of the 1st double_crochet of this round and pull through b 7 single_crochet 2 double_crochet 1 fptr round 13 b if this round is crocheted with 2 colors fptr is crocheted with the 2nd color after this round you will have a lovely coaster skip 1 st behind each fpedc3tog and each fptr chain 1 single_crochet fpedc3tog see 1st photo below 3 single_crochet the 2nd single_crochet is made on the fptr of round 12 fpedc3tog 2 single_crochet fptr around the fpedc2tog of round 10 single_crochet x 8 slip_stitch in the bl of the 1st single_crochet and pull through a 7 single_crochet 2 fpedc3tog 1 treble_crochet round 14 a in this round the fpsc are made around the fpedc3tog of round 13 chain 1 fpsc 3 double_crochet fpsc 2 double_crochet single_crochet 2 double_crochet x 8 slip_stitch in the bl of the 1st fpsc and pull through b 1 single_crochet 7 double_crochet 2 fpsc © big splash by yvonne van zijl @bokkyshome 2023 12 round 15 b chain 1 7 single_crochet the 7th single_crochet is made in the bl of the single_crochet of round 14 double_crochet in the indicated st in the 1st photo below fpedc around fpedc of round 13 double_crochet in the indicated st in the 2nd photo below skip 1 double_crochet 2 single_crochet the 2nd single_crochet is made in the fpsc of round 14 x 8 slip_stitch in the bl of the 1st single_crochet and pull through a 9 single_crochet 2 double_crochet 1 fpedc round 16 a chain 1 single_crochet 4 double_crochet skip 4 st behind these 4 double_crochet 5 single_crochet the 2nd 3rd and 4th single_crochet are made in the bl of the double_crochet edc and double_crochet of round 15 4 double_crochet the 1st double_crochet is made in the hiding st indicated in the 1st photo below skip only 2 st behind these 4 double_crochet x 8 slip_stitch in the bl of the 1st single_crochet and pull through b 6 single_crochet 8 double_crochet round 17 b skip 1 st behind each fpedc no increases are made in this round if this round is crocheted in 1 color all st are crocheted in that single color if this round is crocheted in 2 colors the treble_crochet is crocheted
